synopsis.text: Ryou Yamada, Nijika Ijichi, Ikuyo Kita, and Hitori 'Bocchi' Gotou form the Kessoku Band, a group of high school girls united by their shared love for music. Bocchi, a socially anxious and lonely girl, spends most of her time playing guitar in the hopes of making friends and joining a band. Her dream becomes a reality when she meets Nijika, an outgoing drummer who invites Bocchi to join her band as their new guitarist. Along with Ryou, the cool bassist, and Ikuyo, the band's original guitarist who later rejoins, the group puts their hearts into improving their musical skills and performing live. As they navigate the challenges and triumphs of their high school days, the girls find happiness and empowerment in their shared passion for music. With Bocchi finally finding a place where she belongs, the Kessoku Band sets out to make the most of their fleeting youth and leave their mark on the world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
